**About us**
We launched on the 27th April 2012 and have been keeping customers happy ever since, take a look around, you wont find a bad word regarding our services. Although we're still young as a brand, we have over 5 years experience in the webhosting industry with extensive knowledge of both software and hardware based virtualization.

_**Web management**_
All of our virtual server products include SolusVM, a web-based control panel which allows you to control and manage every aspect of your virtual server including power cycling and automated re-installations. 

_**External backups**_
Although we take every step possible to prevent data loss, hardware failures can and probably will happen in time. For this reason, we provide 10GB of free external backup space for you to upload your backups to.

_**Rapid support**_
We are renowned for our fast and efficient approach to customer service. Although we don't provide 24/7 support, we usually respond to support and sales inquiries within 15 minutes during our UK business hours.

**Included features**
- SolusVM VPS Management
- 10GB FTP Backup space (Located in NL)
- Native IPv6 routing / 3 IPv6 Addresses included
- Fully burstable 100Mbit connections (Full-Duplex)
- Installation and application script library - _easily deploy the most popular setups_

**Network Information**
- Premium bandwidth (Level3/Lambdanet)
- Private multi-redundant network (AS29141)
- Servers located in the world-class Equinix facility in Dusseldorf
